description: Non material amendment to planning permission 15/00750/FUL dated 04/01/16 for `Construction of new building up to 5-storeys high comprising 43 no. self-contained flats (Class C3) and 437 sqm of (Class A1) retail space at ground floor level with basement parking. Associated landscaping, refuse stores, cycle stores and amenity space.` Amendments include addition of a door to unit 401, addition of overhead door canopies to lobby entrances, automatic vehicle access gates added to basement car park entrance, amendment to spandrel panels, door added to third floor corridor to green roof, addition of a lift overrun, commercial plant area screened, addition of the air intake and extract from the proposed MVHR system and the proposed boiler flues, addition of rainwater pipes soil vent pipe, addition of solar panels, additional ventilation louvres to bin store and basement escape staircase lobbies, and alterations to balconies (AMENDED DESCRIPTION).
